snippet: The successes and failures of this year's Super Bowl ads. The Oscar-nominated director Ang Lee on the technology behind "Life of Pi." An interactive project empowers students to take action against human trafficking.
abstract: The successes and failures of this year's Super Bowl ads. The Oscar-nominated director Ang Lee on the technology behind "Life of Pi." An interactive project empowers students to take action against human trafficking.

headline.main: TimesCast Media+Tech: Super Bowl Ads Recall Days Gone By
